fullDescription.option: The column to be used as a trace classifier for the first event table.
The column to be used as a trace classifier for the second event table.

The merging strategy. The following strategies are available:
Separate Traces: traces with the same caseID are added to the merged event table as separate traces.
Ignore Second Trace: for traces with the same caseID, only the traces from the first event table are added to the merged event table.
Merge Traces: traces with the same caseID are merge into a single trace containing all events from these traces.

ports.inPort: first event table to be merged (used as the base event table)
